GMetrics - Integration with Other Tools / Frameworks

Application Frameworks

  • Grails - See the Grails GMetrics Plugin.
  • Griffon - See the Griffon GMetrics Plugin

Build and Code Quality Tools

  • Sonar - The Sonar Groovy Plugin uses GMetrics for its calculation of Cyclomatic Complexity for Groovy source code.
